website_summaries.verdict: A little bit bigger and the Microsoft Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse 7000 could be a regular desktop mouse, which makes it easy to use, but not the best for easy traveling.
pros: USB receiver snaps into base, ambidextrous design, two thumb buttons
cons: Fairly big for a laptop mouse
USB receiver doesn't sit flush when stored in base

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mouse for years with my Windows XP, 7 and 8 desktop computers. When it needed to be replaced, I went back to Amazon to purchase again, and was amazed at how the price had gone up. Because it was my favorite mouse, and fit my hand perfectly, I ordered it again anyway, despite the expensive cost. Then something happened in my life, and I didn't get a chance to actually install it (comes with a CD) until the 30 day return period had passed. Turns out it doesn't work with Windows 10. Wish I could return it, but I'm stuck with a mouse I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret G.

customer_reviews.title: bad product (or i got a lemon)
customer_reviews.text: this mouse stopped working within the first few weeks i had it. and when it was working, i didn't care for it too much. the control over the mouse was not smooth enough for me. also, the USB plug is huge! since i always had it plugged in, i was scared that i was gonna accidentally hit it and break my USB port. next i bought a logitech mouse that was much cheaper, worked much better, and had a very small USB plug that barely stuck out. been using it for almost three years now and it still works perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: rachel mcbroom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Laser Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I use this mouse on my Desktop. After trying several others for my laptop....I finally purchased a second one of these Microsoft wireless notebook laser Mouse. This mouse fits great in your hand, has a light touch. I have arthiritis and carparel tunnel in my hands and this is the only mouse that doesn't hurt my hands. Best mouse on the market if you truly want a mouse that has such a light touch. Expecially fits very nicely in women's hands. Excellent Product !!! Product came quickly and just as described . Great price Also. I paid $60 at Staples for my first purchase of this same mouse.
customer_reviews.author: blueskys

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Found this mouse to be well made, a smaller version of the dependable Microsoft desktop versions. Needs a single 2A battery and your on your way. Nicely hidden battery door comes off easily with a fingernail. For traveling, insert USB counterpart in same area to keep them together. The USB R/T is longish and can get in way when moving or setting down while attached to laptop. It also makes it own click sound and blue light when mouse is moved that can be slightly annoying
customer_reviews.author: Temp

customer_reviews.title: Works on my shiny kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: I got the laser 7000 because I hadn't found a mouse that would work directly on my shiny kitchen table. This one DOES. The speed is just fine for me for everyday use. The only thing I will have to work on is getting used to the left and right side buttons . . . it's like I can't click the side button without accidently pressing down on the left click button, ackward, but maybe I just need more practice. Hey, at least I finally have the freedom to use a mouse without a pad and that's worth tons to me.
customer_reviews.author: RedCardinal

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are included
customer_reviews.text: Was nice when this was opened on Christmas morning to find that the battery it needed was already included in the packaging. The installation CD it came with was completely worthless, it wasn't compatible with Windows 7. However, there was an easy to find patch available on the internet that made the mouse work flawlessly. Mouse is a little bulky, but comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized mouse for laptops. Battery lasts a long time if you use the snap-in receiver to turn the mouse off when no longer used. There is also a battery life indicator which comes in handy when we need to know whether we need to buy new batteries before a trip. The mouse is very responsive for typical home and office use. This is the 2nd MS 7000 mouse that I bought, and so far I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: TTruong

customer_reviews.title: Hard to control
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a different Microsoft mouse and it worked perfectly. This one once I get the cursor to where I want it starts to wander. Also the magnifying function comes on unexpectedly and then is hard to turn off. Tried all the adjustments and nothing works. .
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Old design still works.
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is an old design that still works. I've used it over fifteen feet distance from PC and it works fine. The mouse's battery has been installed in the mouse for 4 months, so installed battery's lifetime is fine with me; I don't remove it from the mouse to to preserve batteries. Good Mouse.
customer_reviews.author: GBVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fine for a Long TIme
customer_reviews.text: I finally wore it out. One foot(slider) came off and the wheel bearing wore out. Precision movement of cursor was easy. Batteries lasted for a long time. Distance from laptop was never a problem. Newer mouse has a much smaller dongle which greatly reduces likelihood of breaking it or damaging the USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Over all I really like this mouse. It is exact and does the job. The side bottons are useful but I found them easy to hit on accident. But You can disable them. The range is also very good. I can take the mouse 15 feet away from my laptop and it still works. The only problem I have found is the the battery life. The mouse takes one AA battery. But in about a month I had to replace it. Maybe thats normal? Other than that I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Use
customer_reviews.text: I am a classroom teacher. My computer is hooked to a projector. This mouse was recommended by our tech resource department. I have tried it and it lives up to their hype. It allows interactivity with my computer for me and the students from anywhere in my classroom. It sure saves me from running to the computer (or the Smartboard) to access the software features. An extra set of batteries is good to have on hand but that's no problem. Thanks Microsoft!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Trouble on reflective surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mouse to replace an aging optical wireless mouse. Was disappointed to find that the tracking on my reflective countertop was sluggish and jerky. When touted as a high definition mouse and pinpoint accuracy, I was disappointed. I have to put a mousepad under it to make it functional. Understandably, many optical mouses have difficulty on reflective surfaces, but my old optical mouse didn't. I would have hoped a "laser" mouse would do better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Wireless Notebook Optical Mouse 7000
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this mouse, but it doesn't respond as well as a laser one and that may be due to the surface I'm using it on. I'm on a laptop so I use the mouse on the couch or on the floor and it's jittery. It is smooth when it's tracking and it's very comfortable in the hand. The battery life is extremely long.
customer_reviews.author: Zzzzz

customer_reviews.title: No Blind Mice, no blind mice, see how it runs?
customer_reviews.text: using it right now to navigate this site. It's a wireless mouse. It uses batteries at about the rate I expected...not bad. I am an occasional user of this on my laptop. (usually on the desk top working).
customer_reviews.author: HomeMaid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse. I've been using it for over a year now and I haven't had any problems with it. It's light and portable. I love that the USB receiver fits right into the mouse itself which triggers it to save the battery life and makes it easy to keep track of--you won't lose the small USB receiver! I think it's comfortable to use and glides smoothly. It works on almost any surface, except of course for those surfaces that optical mice have trouble on. The scrolling button can move in any direction making it a great way to scroll. It's really a great buy and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth scroll wheel
customer_reviews.text: I specifically searched for a mouse that had a smooth (non-ratcheting) scroll wheel. This scroll wheel is very smooth and does not bother or irritate my finger. One of the few mice that has such a smooth scroller which is great.
customer_reviews.author: inalaop

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: While I only scored the product 4 stars, it works extremely well. I marked it down only because there is no tactile feedback on the scroll wheel. After decades of having the ratcheting sound and feel, it is just un-nerving. Others may not have this reaction. All that said, I would buy it again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PSU Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is awesome. All it does not have is a laser pointer and I really don't need that. It handles so well; the battery goes on and on; it is a pleasure to use this product. I am completely satisfied. The price is unbeatable! Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Processes

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Some driver problems with Windows 7, but if you are decent with computers it shouldn't be a problem to figure out in like 30 minutes, and once you get it working it works fantastic, doesn't eat batteries, and has a great range, customizable buttons are pretty great too.
customer_reviews.author: Tank.

customer_reviews.title: The Microsoft Notebook laser Mouse 7000
customer_reviews.text: Having used the mouse for about a month by now, I am entirely satisfies with its performance. However, it took me some time to get the hang of it. There are so many bells and whistles included in it. For instance, it took me some time to realize that it has side buttons on both left and right side. Until I found out about the right side buttons, it behaved strangely for a while until I was able to program that side to ignore any settings. After that, it behaved just fine. TrapperArne
customer_reviews.author: trapperarne

customer_reviews.title: Nothing much to complain
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is fine, I can't find another laser wireless mouse with such less amount of money. Overally, it work fine and the range is as it advertised. Pity it didn't come with a OFF button to shut down the mouse and save battery. There is only 1 con, the wheel button is too light and hard to click accurately on it. Like other said, it will tend to scroll a bit if you do not pay attention when clicking on the wheel. Overall, it is a product which exceed it price. Laser wireless mouse, with left, right tilt wheel, and also back and forward button. Worth the penny.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. LIM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mouse !!
customer_reviews.text: I've had no trouble with this mouse once so ever. The side buttons are very customizable compared to other mice I've used. The range is great and some blocking the signal doesn't matter at all, which was an issue with one of my previous mice. It's a very comfortable fit in your hand and I love the design. Definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Nimble and Agile...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wireless mouse hoping for something that was responsive, had decent battery life and fit well in my hand without being huge and cumbersome for when having to tote it away in my bag. I would definitely recommend this mouse, even as a replacement for a full model mouse - I carry this one to and from work to use with my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Usher

customer_reviews.title: It Maybe Broken
customer_reviews.text: The sensitivity is very limited. Not a great tool for editing where precision is key. This thing is NOT precise. As a matter of fact it the scroll wheel to move to and fro with pages doesn't even work. I was troubleshooting for a couple of hours and am frustrated. That feature was why I wanted this mouse. Ugh! Well, the scrolling feature works great. That's about it for now. I'm asking the seller to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Urbanmuser

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I would say this product is ok, it last around 2 years and the middle scroll button stop working. It's just a so so product.
customer_reviews.author: Santata

customer_reviews.title: A rarity
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to the 5 button mouse format with forward and back buttons on either side. This is the only wireless mouse I have ever found of this type, which is why I have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: bblumberg

customer_reviews.title: ice
customer_reviews.text: Fit my hand perfectly and is my favorite type mouse when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laptop as I don't like the touch pad. It installed easily and works good. I like the compact size and that the receiver stores in the bottom of the mouse when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: A great product for a cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a month now, and it works great. Especially like that it can be used with either hand. The wheel action is smooth, and the side buttons (which other mice at this price don't have) are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tonsing

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived earlier than expected; in fact it arrived before the promised shipping date. It works fine and is much easier to use than the buildt in mouse pad on my new ACER Lap top. The down side is minor - no instruction book - therefore I have not figured out what some of the buttons do. I am happy and pleased with what it does do, and it does exactly what I needed it to do. You cannot beat the delivered price I paid - just under twenty dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Hains

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse 7000 Mac/Win USB
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap replacement. Magnifier button gets hit sometimes when not wanting to, as it is in an easy spot to hit. Would still buy again as price is great. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: M. George

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Installs without incident. Has good hand feel. Cursor movement sensitivity and consistency is excellent. I will order another for work PC and for my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with a laptop. This mouse works as it should, installation was easy, no software issues. Battery life has been good. The design is comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R Man

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft wireless laser mouse 7000
customer_reviews.text: Nice mouse for wireless use on a laptop. Good feel and accutacy. Having the receiver store in the base with the off switch integrated seems to work great and saves the battery. I have only had the mouse for 3 weeks so I can not give an accurate lifetime on the battery. M Brenner
customer_reviews.author: Merrill Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Great for HTPC
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wireless mouse. Works good at 10 feet away. Occasionly it won't respond on the first move or click but, I think that a ottoman is in the way. I am highly pleased with this mouse and recommend it to anyone looking to simplify thier HTPC setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Mouse
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The mouse does not give me any problem and the comfort is great and very responsive. I've use the battery come with it but it not last, may be it been keeping for a while. I've change a new battery last month, it been running until now. let see what its max period the battery could last. It does not come with the bag or pouch. if it come with it, that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Jinson

customer_reviews.title: Still working great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this as my primary mouse for about 4 months, now and it still works flawlessly. I like having a mouse with side buttons for internet navigation. The scroll button (not the wheel) is sometimes a little balky.
customer_reviews.author: John Uhr

customer_reviews.title: doesn't click while scrolling
customer_reviews.text: i bought this mouse because it was the newest model from microsoft at a good price, BUT it seems it is TOO technologically advanced...the little "click" that happens while using the scroll feature is gone, making it much harder to control how much you actually scroll..everything else is fine though
customer_reviews.author: Bocachic

customer_reviews.title: No off button
customer_reviews.text: I use it to run my laptop on my TV and have no range problems from about 15 feet. It has no off button so I wonder how long the battery will last.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Hellkamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it was the cheapest recognizable brand wireless mouse. It gets the job done. Only drawback is the larger size usb key compared to the new nano usb keys.
customer_reviews.author: SPY-C

customer_reviews.title: Wheel has no resistance
customer_reviews.text: A minus for this mouse: its wheel. When clicking the wheel (e.g.: over a link for opening it in a new tab), the mouse registers also a scrolling action, so you miss the link. This is because the wheel has no resistance. I wouldn't buy this mouse again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It worked well at first but only lasted about 6 mths. Maybe it was operator error, but I've had others last for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: mickeycat

customer_reviews.title: smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: It was REALLY nice to begin with. Seems as though that RF interference might be causing it to be occasionally flaky.
customer_reviews.author: archer0520

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use right out of the box on my iMac. Didn't even need the CD that accompanied mouse. Has a little more play in it than I'd prefer, but it works just as described. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: SAH

customer_reviews.title: Mouse did not work
customer_reviews.text: Could not install software from the disk included with the mouse due to incompatible OS. Running Windows 7 Professional 64 bit. Downloaded proper software online but mouse still would not work. Returned it for refund and installed a Logitech mouse with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: works good.
customer_reviews.text: All the features work good. Would be better for browsing if it had a 'forward' button like some. Only down side is the size of the USB antenia.
customer_reviews.author: frank c cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my laptop. Works very well and is my favorite name brand electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MOUSE I WOULD BUY AND BUY I WOULD BUY AGAIN. YOU SHOULD TOO DON'T HESITATE YOU WON'T BE SORRY
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: a good mouse
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It is nice, not very large. It follows the movement of my hand very easily. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Klimova

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: High quality mouse. Have been using this for over a year now and really love it. Wouldn't change for anything.
customer_reviews.author: EatSmart Support

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student and needed a mouse for my new laptop. I like this one. I works with Windows7. There was no need to install the software on the disk because of Windows7. After connecting it once or twice the computer would recognize it without downloading extra software. The mouse itself is sensitive to my likings. All in all this is a very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: EddieJV

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not too big not too small. Perfect mobility for a notebook/laptop. Operation is flawless. Also very nice looking and perfect colors for a mouse. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouse Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cordless mouse I have used in many years. It's battery life is decent even if you don't shut it off when not in ues. The controls are all smooth and easy to use. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: stmux

customer_reviews.title: great mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse works great. I use it on the road and expecially like the ability to store the usb key in the bottom of the mouse.
customer_reviews.author: G. Laymon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best mice I have used. The only complaint that I have is that I should have bought it sooner. I like the fact that I can program the extra buttons to perform different tasks in different applications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MOUSE I HAVE EVER USED THUS FAR!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know where to start. I am very happy with this product in fact it is by far the best mouse I have every used. I do however there was a matching set (mouse and keyboard under the same model).
customer_reviews.author: Darrell K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding long-range mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mouse. Great for use in a classroom where you can operate the computer/projected image from anywhere in the room. Delivered on-time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mplumes

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one of these mice. They entire family uses it almost non stop and every one loves it and I love the $17 price. The reason for only 4 stars is because under heavy use you should expect to replace it every year, but for $17 who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Rob NYL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to move around and comfortable to use. I was looking for the higher model but this one does just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse works very well and only have to replace the battery about once a year. Have used this one for 3 years
customer_reviews.author: Perry McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is easy to use and makes things so much easier when using my laptop. This is a great mouse to have when traveling or just needing to do a lot of work on your laptop. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Langfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is good but the side buttons are little hard to press and the scroll is free and i don't like this style. But it's good, the usb adapter is very good, the mouse resists impacts. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: HeitorNF

customer_reviews.title: I own three of these
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, small enough for me to take with me in my computer bag and great microsoft technology. What more could you want in a mouse?
customer_reviews.author: Ransom1

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for a good price. Installed softwear easily. Suprised by magnification button on left side. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: drbob

customer_reviews.title: Bad shape
customer_reviews.text: the mouse has an aweful shape - it will not spare you wrist pain, and is painful to use when your wrists are sore. you are better of with slim mice, such as ones by kensington. other than that drawback, its other features are excellent - battery life, responsiveness etc..
customer_reviews.author: vishvAsa

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is the best notebook mouse I have found. Compact, fits my hand very well, very responsive, and great price from Amazon Thanks Microsoft, and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: usttobee50

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft USB mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse works great. I loaded the software from the disc and everything loaded up and the mouse worked perfectly. It's a great product and I highly recommend this wireless USB mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Best mouse we have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for the office and wound up buying 2 more. We all love this mouse. And the price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: bffgrandma

customer_reviews.title: works intermittently
customer_reviews.text: It is inconsistent when alreay attached to a windows 7 operating system It is not as good as logitech product do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Pribilski

customer_reviews.title: MS wireless mouse 7000
customer_reviews.text: For those have MS wireless mouse 7000 for desktop. the transceiver for this mouse (notebook) is compatible with desktop model. BTW it is good mouse.
customer_reviews.author: DiGisoul

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mouse. It is small but fits well in the hand. it is smooth and it has a third button for using as back when surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: TennisMom
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is better than I thought. I wish I would have ordered it earlier. No wires and it is so easy to use. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Great AP

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong over a year later
customer_reviews.text: I got this mouse in Jan of 2010, and it's still working as great as the day I opened it for the first time. It's compact and reliable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good overall wireless mouse
customer_reviews.text: Scroll speed is sometimes slow and sometimes fast. Not sure if it's the mouse or my laptop is somehow causing it.
customer_reviews.author: drm

customer_reviews.title: Good Microsoft Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this mouse for three weeks now. Good shape and features. Works fine with Dell Computer. No interference and good precision. No complaints. Fare price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Macedo Dias

customer_reviews.title: Blocked due to compatibility issues with Windows 7.  Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says this mouse works with Windows 7. But not on my laptop. The software brings up the message "BLOCKED" due to compatibility issues with my laptop running Windows 7. Now I need to find a mouse that works with Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: wireless

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to sync, didn't even have to install the software!!! Has a forward and BACK browser bustton-GREAT for my laptop!!!
customer_reviews.author: dis0201

customer_reviews.title: This did not work with the computer
customer_reviews.text: Two of them I tried but could not get the laptop to accept owner changed. I bought a Logitech M325 instead.
customer_reviews.author: LinL

customer_reviews.title: Mouse Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate this product as the mouse I received was broken. Had to send it back. Thought it was a newer model, but had a manufacture date of 2008, so not that new!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: being driven insane from the whining sound this thing makes
customer_reviews.text: Every time I move the mouse or press the button, this thing emanates this buzzing/whining sound. It's absolutely maddening and unusable. Is there a way to fix this? If not this mouse is destined for the trash...
customer_reviews.author: maxpower

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It arrived dead. I can also say this is the second Microsoft mouse I received DOA, in a row. Looks like Microsoft is using its customers as unpaid beta testers -- at their expense (both mice cost me to ship back -- not to mention the long drives to the FedEx depot).
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: Microsoft Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse 7000 Mac/Win USB, Black\Grey
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Step up to Superior Performance
Step up from older 27 MHz wireless technology to Microsoft 2.4 GHz wireless and experience a confident connection, even in crowded wireless environments such as airports or meeting rooms--plus a 30-foot range for more freedom.  * 2.4 GHz wireless offers a confident wireless connection, even in crowded wireless environments. 
 * Four-way scrolling allows you to efficiently scroll side to side as well as up and down in worksheets. 
 * Just point and press the magnifier button to enlarge and edit details.* 



Snap-In Receiver
Use the snap-in receiver to turn off the mouse and save battery life. Many users average more than six months of battery life. 



Microsoft High Definition Laser Technology
Two generations ahead of standard optical and laser mouse products.** 





 * More responsive: 1000 dpi 
 * More precise: 6000 FPS, 85 MOPS, 0.18 microns or smaller 
 * Smoother tracking: Microsoft Intelligent Tracking System 

*If you are using Macintosh OS X, the magnifier feature enlarges text and images on the entire screen.
**Standard optical technology = mouse products with 0.35 microns or older CMOS technology
feature_bullets: Microsoft Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse 7000 General Features: Color: Silver/Black
Compact, portable size ideal for use with notebooks
Ambidextrous design for left or right-handed users High definition laser technology
2.4 GHz wireless connectivity Up to 30-foot operating range Tilt Wheel for 4-way scrolling
Magnifier button to enlarge details on screen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
